SENT.plain: Fourty children with MDS treated in seven centres of The Polish Children's Leukemia Lymphoma Study Group in period 1975-1998y were included to the study
In 16 children RAEB-T, in 2 CMML in 10 RA and in 12 RAEB were diagnosed
Our and literature data showed that BMT is the best therapy for children with MDS
For children, who don't have a donor for BMT
Roacutan therapy seems to be the most effective
